results.title: Brothers Among 3 Brussels Suicide Attackers; Another Assailant Is Sought
results.abstract: Ibrahim el-Bakraoui attacked the airport and his brother Khalid attacked the subway, Belgian officials said, as an inquiry drew links to the 2015 Paris attacks.
results.byline: By ALISSA J. RUBIN, KIMIKO DE FREYTAS-TAMURA and AURELIEN BREEDEN

results.title: A Quandary for Europe: Fighting a War on ISIS Within Its Borders
results.abstract: For European leaders, who see themselves as at war with the Islamic State, the problem is that the enemy’s hide-outs are not in a faraway failed state.

results.title: Brussels Survivors Say Blasts Instantly Evoked Paris Attacks
results.abstract: “My immediate reaction was, ‘We are getting attacked by terrorists,’” one witness said, echoing others who described explosions and carnage that wrenched them into thinking of the Nov. 13 killings in France.

results.title: Assad May Bet That Russia and West Need Him More Than He Needs Them
